transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_001
transcriptEntries.text: Alright everyone, let's get started. Alex, you want to kick us off?

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_002
transcriptEntries.text: Sure. Yesterday I finished the user profile validation endpoints and started working on the rate limiting middleware. Today I'm planning to finish the rate limiting and get it integrated with the API gateway. No blockers.

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_003
transcriptEntries.text: Great, sounds like good progress. Lisa?

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_004
transcriptEntries.text: I've been working on the OAuth integration with our third-party providers. I got Google working but I'm running into some issues with the Microsoft integration. The redirect URI validation is behaving differently than expected. I might need to pair with someone on debugging this.

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_005
transcriptEntries.text: I can help with that if needed. I dealt with Microsoft OAuth quirks at my previous job.

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_006
transcriptEntries.text: That would be awesome, thank you Mike. Should we set up some time later today?

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_007
transcriptEntries.text: Sure, how about 2 PM?

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_008
transcriptEntries.text: Perfect. Thanks Mike.

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_009
transcriptEntries.text: Great. Tom, how about you?

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_010
transcriptEntries.text: I finished the database migration scripts for the new user schema and ran them against staging. Everything looks good there. Today I'm working on updating the data access layer to handle the new fields. Should be straightforward.

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_011
transcriptEntries.text: Excellent. And Jack, how's the JWT work going?

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_012
transcriptEntries.text: Um, so I've been working on the refresh token implementation. I have the basic structure in place, but I'm running into some questions about the best practices for token storage and validation. I've been researching different approaches but I'm not sure which direction to go.

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_013
transcriptEntries.text: What kind of questions are coming up?

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_014
transcriptEntries.text: Well, like should I be storing the refresh tokens in Redis or the database? And if I store them in Redis, should I hash them first? And then there's the question of token rotation - some articles say you should rotate on every refresh, others say only rotate periodically. I'm seeing conflicting advice.

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_015
transcriptEntries.text: Jack, didn't we go through some of this in our session last week? I thought we settled on Redis with hashed tokens and rotation with a grace period.

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_016
transcriptEntries.text: We did, but then I started reading more about it and found some security articles that suggested different approaches. I wanted to make sure we're following the most secure pattern.

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_017
transcriptEntries.text: I appreciate that you want to get it right, Jack, but at some point we need to make a decision and move forward. What if you implement what we discussed with Mike and we can review it together? If we need to adjust the approach later, we can.

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_018
transcriptEntries.text: Yeah, that makes sense. I'll focus on implementing what we discussed. I guess I'm just worried about making the wrong architectural choice early on.

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_019
transcriptEntries.text: Jack, we can always refactor later if we need to. Sometimes the best way to learn is to build something and see how it works in practice.

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_020
transcriptEntries.text: Right. Okay, I'll stop overthinking it and just build it. Thanks guys.

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_021
transcriptEntries.text: Great. And remember, we have our check-in this afternoon. Alright, Mike, you're up.

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_022
transcriptEntries.text: I've been working on the API gateway configuration for our new endpoints. Got most of the routing rules set up and tested. Today I'll be helping Lisa with the OAuth issues and then working on the load balancing configuration. No blockers on my end.

transcriptEntries.name: conferenceRecords/meet-standup-identity-platform-oct17/transcripts/transcript_001/entries/entry_023
transcriptEntries.text: Perfect. Alright everyone, sounds like we have a good plan for the day. Jack, see you at our check-in. Everyone else, let me know if anything comes up. Have a good day!
